summary: This adds a smaller imperials version, which has currently got the same abilities as Imperials.
descriptionHtml:
This adds a smaller imperials version, which has currently got the same abilities as Imperials. 

Skills:
Sneak +10 
One-Handed +10 
Pickpocket +5 
Speech +5 
Light Armor +5

Race spells:
Peaceful Hobbit: Renamed Voice of the Emperor
Hobbit\'s walk: Muffle 50%

Other:
Added 50 stamina for sprinting, because their height is a disadvantage

I have made betas for this times ago and I discovered hobbits\' height makes them a good target. From now, they regenerate HP in combat.

NOTE: Currently working on more mods, so I will update as soon as possible, but not immediately.
author: Modger99
